name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in building high-performance solutions in dynamic environments. Proficient in **TypeScript**, **AWS**, **Terraform**, and **Git**, I deliver scalable and efficient applications using CI/CD practices with tools such as **CircleCI**. My expertise in Agile methodologies (including **Scrum** and **Kanban**) ensures timely project delivery and collaboration within cross-functional teams.

I have honed my skills in both SQL and NoSQL databases, with hands-on experience in **Postgres**, **DynamoDB**, and **Redis**. My solid technical background is supported by familiarity with testing frameworks like **Jest** and **Vitest**, enhancing the reliability of the software I develop. 

Moreover, I leverage cloud expertise in **AWS** and have a strong command of microservices architecture and event-driven systems. My passion for building compliant applications has led me to understand standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring robust and secure software. I excel in communication and interpersonal skills, making me a valuable team player in collaborative environments.
